test_datasets.description: Comprehensive test datasets for TypoSentinel ML analysis engine

LOW.description: Legitimate packages with minimal risk indicators

MEDIUM.description: Packages with some suspicious characteristics but not clearly malicious

HIGH.description: Packages with clear malicious intent or dangerous patterns

typosquatting.description: Packages that mimic popular package names with slight variations

malicious_scripts.description: Packages with suspicious installation or post-installation scripts

data_exfiltration.description: Packages that collect and transmit sensitive data

credential_theft.description: Packages designed to steal authentication credentials or private keys

dependency_confusion.description: Packages that exploit dependency resolution to replace legitimate packages

obfuscated_code.description: Packages using code obfuscation techniques to hide malicious behavior

package_metadata.downloads: Should correlate with legitimacy (high downloads = lower risk)
package_metadata.age: Newer packages should have higher risk scores
package_metadata.maintainers: Suspicious email domains should increase risk
package_metadata.repository: Missing repository information should increase risk
package_metadata.license: Missing or unusual licenses should increase risk

code_analysis.suspicious_functions: exec, eval, system calls should increase risk
code_analysis.network_requests: Outbound HTTP requests should be flagged
code_analysis.file_system_access: Reading sensitive files should increase risk
code_analysis.environment_access: Accessing environment variables should be flagged

behavioral_patterns.installation_scripts: Post-install scripts with system commands should be flagged
behavioral_patterns.module_replacement: Go module replace directives should be suspicious
behavioral_patterns.base64_encoding: Base64 encoded content should increase risk
behavioral_patterns.crypto_keywords: Crypto-related packages should have additional scrutiny

unit_tests.scoring_algorithm: Test scoring algorithm with known inputs

validation_tests.edge_case_handling: Test with malformed or incomplete package data
